1.title: If They Can Do It, Why Not Me?
1.plot: In the Medieval town of Sanluri (Southern Sardinia), in the heart of the Mediterranean Sea, we discover the story of Giuseppe Melis, founder of Comochi, who become a successful entrepreneur thanks to his idea, intuition and passion for soaps and detergents.

imdb.plot outline: Millionaire Mind Secrets is a documentary television series. The program features the inspirational stories of successful entrepreneurs around the world to discover their secrets and techniques that have led them to conquer great heights and become millionaires with their business ideas. Host Anastasia Deeva explores the inspirational stories of successful entrepreneurs who are changing the world thanks to innovation, vision and determination.
imdb.title: Millionaire Mind Secrets
plot: _Millionaire Mind Secrets_ (qv) is a documentary television series. The program features the inspirational stories of successful entrepreneurs around the world to discover their secrets and techniques that have led them to conquer great heights and become millionaires with their business ideas. Host Anastasia Deeva explores the inspirational stories of successful entrepreneurs who are changing the world thanks to innovation, vision and determination.::Big Enough Productions [gb]
